description:
IMPORTANT: Please note that only Announcements, Gradebook, Assignments, and Resources have native mobile screens on the app because those are the only items with REST API's.

This template contains all of the essential tools to supplement a physical course. It has tools for holding discussions, assigning homework, distributing syllabi and course materials, and grading.

Â 

Tools: Announcements, Assignments, Forums, Gradebook, Lessons, Mailtool, Resources, Tests & Quizzes, Kaltura Media Gallery, & Site Statistics.
htmlDescription: IMPORTANT: Please note that only Announcements, Gradebook, Assignments, and Resources have native mobile screens on the app because those are the only items with REST API's. <p><strong>This template contains all of the essential tools to supplement a physical course. It has tools for holding discussions, assigning homework, distributing syllabi and course materials, and grading.</strong></p>    <p>Tools: Announcements, Assignments, Forums, Gradebook, Lessons, Mailtool, Resources, Tests &amp; Quizzes, Kaltura Media Gallery, &amp; Site Statistics.</p>
htmlShortDescription: This is a test site intended for App Review
